review: Easy to set up and quick to use.  I decided to use the Fire TV because of the ability to hard wire into my modem rather than use WIFI.  Wire is faster.  It has more storage than the Fire Stick.  I was also interested in Amazon Prime which is a good investment if you get either the Fire Stick or TV.  I use this strictly for TV and Movies.  Unfortunately the app for my Kindle Fire HD doesn't work that well with it, I believe the HDX works better.  Not a good move on Amazon's part.  I did purchase a Chromecast.  The Kindle wouldn't work with that either.  I also have a ROKU for the basement TV which is also very good.
